info.description: Create payment transactions or place holds for checks or pre-authorized transactions
info.title: US Model Bank - Payment services

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.summary: Create a hold transaction to lock the funds in an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves information the amount locked, lock type and the validity for a hold transaction

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update amount or validity date of an existing hold

parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves details of all holds placed on an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: holdTypeId
parameters.description: Purpose or the type of hold placed on the account  The available list of hold types can be retrieved through getHoldTypes

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: API to retrieve domestic account transfers or bill payment

parameters.name: orderingCustomerId
parameters.description: Indicates the customer id for the ordering customer

parameters.name: requiredCreditValueDate
parameters.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

parameters.name: paymentOrderProductId
parameters.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

parameters.name: paymentStatus
parameters.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

debitCurrencyId.description: The currency of the debit side in payment transaction.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

treasuryRate.description: The Treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and the ordering currency

processingDate.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system.

customerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually applied for currency conversion in case of transactions involving FX conversion.

customerSpread.description: The spread that is applied to the published internal exchange rates to derive the final exchange rate or the customer rate for the transaction

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorized the transaction.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

deptCode.description: The department code where the transaction was authorized.

auditTimeDate.description: Reference to the audit date and time.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

holdTypeId.description: Purpose or the type of hold placed on the account  The available list of hold types can be retrieved through getHoldTypes

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

fromDate.description: Indicates the business date from when the balance reservation event is active.

toDate.description: Indicates the business date until when the balance reservation event is active.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

blockPriorityId.description: When there are multiple holds or locks placed on an account, it holds the priority of releasing the holds for a payment, while performing retry process in an account

operand.description: This field along with fieldName and value, defines the conditions for the alert to be triggered.

values.description: The value of the field on which the Alert criteria is based

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

stopTypeId.description: Indicates the reason why a Payment Stop is requested for e.g. Cheque lost, funds not available etc.

transactionChannel.description: The channel through which the transaction has been placed

stopInstructionChannel.description: Stop instruction channel for  transaction stop

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

replacementCheck.description: Captures the check number to be used replacing the original one provided at the time of capturing the stop instruction

replacementCheckIssueDate.description: Captues the check issue date of the replacement check

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

waiveCharge.description: Indicates if the charges are to be waived for the instruction

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

suppressNotice.description: Indicates if a customers or accounts advice or notice that usually gets generated based on certain events should be generated. eg, creation of a new stop transaction notice to an account holder when he places a transaction stop request, confirming the details of the stop request.

cancelInstruction.description: Will allow the user to cancel an active Transaction Stop Instruction and this will move the Status of the instruction to Cancelled

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

beneficiaryInstituteAddress.description: Address of the routing or Intermediary Financial Institute. Information will be used in wire messages

beneficiaryAddress.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

beneficiaryAddressLine1.description: Address of the beneficiary or credit account.

intermediaryFiNameAddressLine.description: Intermediary Financial Institution Name and address

originatorToBeneficiaryInformation.description: Information from originator to the beneficiary regarding the payment

receiverFiAndIntermediaryFiInfo.description: Specifies the additional information between the Receiver and intermediary financial institution

wireAdviceCode.description: Supplementary information can be passed in advices between Financial Institutions indicating the name of the originating party, beneficiary, beneficiary account number etc. The advice code indicates the type of advice information shared in the advice.

wireAdviceInformation.description: Supplementary information passed in wire transfers

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

paymentPriority.description: Indicates the payment priority using a service code. Allowed values can be retreived using getEbLookups for virtualTableName PAYMENT.SERVICE.LEVEL.CODE.

orderingCustomerId.description: Indicates the customer id for the ordering customer

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

schedulePaymentAmount.description: Contains the amount payable in the schedule

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryInstituteRoutingNo.description: Routing number of DDA number of the Financial institution where the beneficiary account exists

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

intermediaryFiBicCode.description: BIC code of Intermediary Financial institution

intermediaryFiRoutingNo.description: Routing number of Intermediary Financial institution

instructionIdReference.description: Captures the type of identification for the originator, like Swift, chips participant, passport number, etc,. Required information for DRW type wire transfer

paymentStatus.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. companyEntryDescription.description: Description of the ACH payment that is displayed on the statement.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

beneficiaryOtherId.description: Indicates the beneficiary other identifier, e.g. could be a Social Security Number, a Tax Identification Number, Passport Number, a Clearing Id etc.

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: This is the national clearing code or sort code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

paymentCurrency.description: This field holds the transaction currency or currency in which payment is initiated.

paymentOrderProductId.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

enum: User who has input or changed the record

enum: Code of Auditor who has audited the record

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

beneficiaryOtherId.description: Indicates the beneficiary other identifier, e.g. could be a Social Security Number, a Tax Identification Number, Passport Number, a Clearing Id etc.

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: This is the national clearing code or sort code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

paymentCurrency.description: This field holds the transaction currency or currency in which payment is initiated.

paymentOrderProductId.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.
enum: No of times record has been changed

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction
enum: User who has input or changed the record

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

authoriser.description: This indicates the user who authorized the transaction.
enum: User who has authorised the input or change

deptCode.description: The department code where the transaction was authorized.

enum: Code of Auditor who has audited the record

auditTimeDate.description: Reference to the audit date and time.

beneficiaries.description: Identifies the Beneficiary name and address of the Standing Order

beneficiary.description: Identifies the Beneficiary name and address of the Standing Order

currentFrequency.description: Indicates the current frequency of the standing order

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

companyEntryDescription.description: Description of the ACH payment that is displayed on the statement.

currentEndDate.description: Identifies the current end date of the standing order for the currency, amount and frequency specified. When the bank has received from the customer clear instructions which stipulate that the standing order must  only be executed during a determined period of time.  This is the date of the last execution of the standing order or when the customer has requested the bank to pay a certain amount during a determined period of time and then another amount starting from that date. In this case, this field specifies the end date of the first standing order amount.  After that date the second amount will then be executed.

currentAmountBalance.description: Indicates the amount of the Standing Order.Incase of Balance Maintenance Standing Order, this field will define the Balance to be maintained in the Account.

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

beneficiaryOtherId.description: Indicates the beneficiary other identifier, e.g. could be a Social Security Number, a Tax Identification Number, Passport Number, a Clearing Id etc.

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: This is the national clearing code or sort code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

paymentDetail.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

This is the date of the last execution of the standing order or when the customer has requested the bank to pay a certain amount during a determined period of time and then another amount starting from that date. In this case, this field specifies the end date of the first standing order amount.  After that date the second amount will then be executed.

paymentDetail.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

paymentOrderProductName.description: Indicates the name of payment order product

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

frequency.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application(periodic payments) execute the payment instruction.

paymentDetail.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

currencyMarket.description: The Currency market as available in the statement entry is updated here

terminationDate.description: This is the termination date of recurring direct debit

direction.description: Indicates the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received. The claim can be 'Outward' i.e. Claim is sent to the other bank or 'Inward'  i.e. other bank submit their claim to debit our customer's account.

standAloneDdi.description: Defines whether the direct debit mandate is for stand-alone purpose i.e. one-off instruction

standaloneAmount.description: The amount of the stand-alone direct debit
